channel.title: Starting runescape 2007
channel.description: I had pretty much forgotten that they had brought it back. Before I buy membership to play, which you apparantly have to, how are things in rs 2007 currently? Are there many bots just like real runescape? Is it hard to level due to many people?

item.title: Starting runescape 2007
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

when I said what economy that’s what I was referring to that there isn’t an economy with bots around.

Read full topic

I can’t tell if dumb or
[/quote]If you can’t open your eyes tot he fact that botting destroys an economy I feel sorry for you.[/quote]

But that isn’t what you said at all. You asked ‘what economy’ which just makes you look like a pompous moron

item.title: Starting runescape 2007
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

3lv3n snip3r:

Bots run the economy.

I’m sure this is a given in any game, mainly because the average player isn’t willing to put as much effort in or they just don’t like the game. Honestly, my past experiences from botting have proof both consequential and knowledgeable, because my first account I ever made and put legitimate effort into was banned just because of a few uses of a bot script. When you bot for something, the desire to play the game will eventually fade away because most people play games for the challenge and achievements along the way. The only real reason I could believe someone botted and enjoyed it is whenever they are receiving a source of real life currency from the game.

Read full topic
